turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what location would you like to pickup your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Red Lion Road in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is the Starbucks located on 10000 Roosevelt Blvd, Philadelphia, PA. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caffe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes just regular sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. To confirm you want a grande caffe latte with regular sugar and with two percent milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: At what time would you like to get this drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ASAP.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I placed your order to be made ASAP. Would like like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are very welcome. Enjoy your drink.
